"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This intense and motivational track would get me pumped up and ready to tackle any challenge that comes my way. Its powerful lyrics and driving beat would help me tap into my inner strength and determination.

"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles - This iconic song is a symbol of hope and renewal, and its uplifting melody would help me shake off any lingering doubts or fears. Its message of perseverance and resilience would remind me that even in the darkest times, there is always a brighter future ahead.

"Unwritten" by Natasha Bedingfield - This empowering anthem celebrates the idea that our lives are not predetermined, and that we have the power to shape our own destiny. Its catchy melody and inspiring lyrics would remind me to stay focused and keep moving forward, even when faced with setbacks or uncertainties.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This anthemic song is all about embracing our inner strength and confidence, and its powerful vocals and catchy melody would help me tap into my own inner power and resilience. Its message of self-empowerment would remind me to stand up for myself and assert my own identity.

"Brave" by Sara Bareilles - This heartfelt ballad is a powerful reminder to be true to ourselves and speak our minds. Its soaring vocals and poignant lyrics would help me find the courage to be authentic and vulnerable, and its message of self-acceptance would remind me to love and accept myself exactly as I am.
